message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $180. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
Hi Alice, I think the product is a great value, but I was hoping we could meet in the middle. I'm willing to pay $150 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $165?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'm willing to go to $155. Can you meet me there?
